alert.note: Alert for Traill (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 8:25PM CDT until April 25 at 2:42AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in North Dakota... Goose River at Hillsboro affecting Traill County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Goose River at Hillsboro. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.5 feet, Portions of ND Highway 200 closed due to water on the road (2018 due to ice/log jam). * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 8.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 14.5 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
